content: प्रतिबुध् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To wake, wake up, awaken; <ls>Ms. 1. 74</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 330.</ls> {@--2@} To perceive, be conscious, know. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To awaken, rouse from sleep; प्रियया प्रतिबोध्यमानमपि सुप्तं ( हतहृदयं) <ls>Ś. 6. 6.</ls> {@--2@} To inform, make known, acquaint with, communicate; भावितात्मा भुवो भर्तुरथैनं प्रत्यबोधयत् <ls>R. 1. 74</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 8.</ls> {@--3@} To charge or entrust with.
